name: Financial Aid
description: 10,000 Degrees is here to help you find the resources you need to afford college. "No GPA or test scores required, just your potential. Equity is core to our mission".
fullDescription: 10,000 Degrees is here to help you find the resources you need to afford college. "No GPA or test scores required, just your potential. Equity is core to our mission".
whatTheyOffer: 10,000 Degrees is here to help you find the resources you need to afford college. "No GPA or test scores required, just your potential. Equity is core to our mission".
howToGetIt: Use the online videos at https://www.10000degrees.org/financial-aid/ to discover what types of free financial aid are available, what application students need to fill out, timelines, and more. Applications available at https://www.10000degrees.org/financial-aid/
address: 1401 Los Gamos Drive, San Rafael, CA,  94903
